transactionSet.name: Purchase Order Message
transactionSet.description: A message specifying details for goods or services ordered under conditions agreed between the seller and the buyer.

segment.name: Message Header
segment.description: To head, identify and specify a message.

dataElement.name: Message reference number
dataElement.description: Unique message reference assigned by the sender.

dataElement.name: Message type identifier
dataElement.description: Code identifying a type of message and assigned by its controlling agency.

dataElement.name: Message type version number
dataElement.description: Version number of a message type.

dataElement.name: Message type release number
dataElement.description: Release number within the current message type version number (0052).

dataElement.name: Controlling agency
dataElement.description: Code identifying the agency controlling the specification, maintenance and publication of the message type.

dataElement.name: Association assigned code
dataElement.description: Code, assigned by the association responsible for the design and maintenance of the message type concerned, which further identifies the message.

dataElement.name: Common access reference
dataElement.description: Reference serving as a key to relate all subsequent transfers of data to the same business case or file.

dataElement.name: Sequence message transfer number
dataElement.description: Number assigned by the sender indicating that the message is an addition or change of a previously sent message relating to the same topic.

dataElement.name: First/last sequence message transfer indication
dataElement.description: Indication used for the first and last message in a sequence of the same type of message relating to the same topic.

segment.name: Beginning of Message
